PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeFloorTrap
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe fitting, set into the floor, that retains liquid to prevent the passage of foul air.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the chamber of the gully trap.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the y-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted =length, measured along the z-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: IsForSullageWater
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates if the purpose of the floor trap is to receive sullage water, or if that is amongst its purposes (= TRUE), or not (= FALSE). Note that if TRUE, it is expected that an upstand or kerb will be placed around the floor trap to prevent the ingress of surface water runoff; the provision of the upstand or kerb is not dealt with in this property set.

PropertyDef.Name: SpilloverLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: The level at which water spills out of the terminal.

PropertyDef.Name: TrapType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of waste trap used in combination with the floor trap from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: HasStrainer
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the gully trap has a strainer (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: OutletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the outlet connection from the waste disposal unit.

PropertyDef.Name: InletPatternType
PropertyDef.Definition:
Identifies the pattern of inlet connections to a trap.
A trap may have 0,1,2,3 or 4 inlet connections and the pattern of their arrangement may vary. The enumeration makes the convention that an outlet is either vertical or is placed at the bottom (south side) of the trap (when viewed in plan). Position 1 is to the left (west), position 2 is to the top (north), position 3 is to the right (east) and position 4 is to the bottom (south).

PropertyDef.Name: InletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition:
Size of the inlet connection(s), where used, of the inlet connections.
Note that all inlet connections are assumed to be the same size.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the oil interceptor.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the oil interceptor.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the cover or grating is constructed.
